item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Norman Mailer
item.description: "I don't think life is absurd. I think we are all here for a huge purpose. I think we shrink from the immensity of the purpose we are here for." -- Norman Mailer

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough of is love." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Kimchi add a quote by Marion Zimmer Bradley
item.description: "Remain true to yourself, child. If you know your own heart, you will always have one friend who does not lie." -- Marion Zimmer Bradley
